text: <@U01DZUA88S1> I saw your post in the bug thread. Thanks for looking at my proposal. It was the first time doing it so I messed up the markdown formatting but now know how to do it correctly now. It didn’t occur to me to even add any CC’s. For the future who should be CC’d automatically when working out bugs we discuss in the group? I had thought of looking more closely at functions like plot to see how they handle lists but forgot :). I’ll take a look at your solution. What happens next? we wait for a response from R core?
